name: Oven
description: Client is unemployed and currently 7 months pregnant. There is no working adult in the family. Client hopes to have an oven (halal) so that she could learn baking and potentially start a business. Please WhatsApp Odelia at 8588 3163 or email to odelia.teo@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

passiton.name: Oven Toaster
passiton.dimensions: L38 X W22 X H20 cm

name: Blender
description: VOX @ Children's Society requires a Blender with no preference of brands. They required these for their cooking programme for our youths. Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor, please click to donate so that we can get in touch with you soon. We thank you for your kindness in advance!

name: Oxygen Concentrator
description:
74-year-old elderly lady has late-stage cancer. She requires an oxygen concentrator to help with breathlessness. Family has financial difficulties and is unable to afford the cost of renting or buying one. Looking for a donor who has a secondhand one in good condition. 

Pls contact me at 97274215 via Whatsapp. Thank you.

passiton.name: Oxygen Concentrator
passiton.description: It's an working Oxygen Concentrator used for people whom has difficulty in breathing and has been advised by doctor to use the machine for relax breathing.New tubes available too

passiton.name: Oxygen Concentrator Machine
passiton.description: Oxygen Concentrator machine with original manual and box.

name: Sofa
description: Family, consists of parents and four young children (aged 6 months to 4 years), is facing financial difficulties. They currently reside in a 1-room HDB rental flat. The father is unable to work due to spinal issues, as supported by a doctorâ€™s memo, while the mother serves as the primary caregiver. They are in the midst of moving to a 2-room flat and need assistance with their refurbishment. The family is unable to afford on the home furnishing items due to their financial constraints. Your support would greatly help them during this challenging period.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Kelly Lim

passiton.name: 2.5 seater Sofa
passiton.description: White pre-loved sofa in good condition. Adjustable head rest.

passiton.name: 3-Seater Leather Recliner Sofa with Cover!
passiton.description:
Upgrade your living space with this comfortable 3-seater leather recliner sofa, available for free! Used for 3 years, it features a reclining function for ultimate relaxation. The leather shows some wear, but a stylish cover is included to keep it looking fresh.
Condition: Used, leather slightly worn
Features: Recliner function, cover included
Collection: Self-collection only 
Grab this opportunity to enhance your home at no cost! Contact me to arrange a pickup.

name: Geriatric Chair
description: Elderly client who is diagnosed with stroke requires geriatric chair for sleeping/sitting. Current geriatric chair has malfunction and he does not have the financial means to repair it. Client looking for a working condition which allows to recline.

contact.org: NTUC Health Cluster Support - Taman Jurong
contact.name: Muhammad Azfar Bin Nazri

passiton.name: Geriatric chair
passiton.description: item was being use less than 3 months. Wish to donate out to the less fortunate people who needs it more. Thank you

name: Geriatric Chair
description:
Elderly advance-stage cancer patient with multiple co-morbidities is in need of replacement geriatric chair as current chair has faulty wheel-locks and worn out due to daily use and wear and tear.

Family is in need as son is the only breadwinner.
specifications: Manual Mobile Recliner Geriatric Chair with Tray

name: Wheelchair
description: Client comes from a low-income family. He is an above-knee bilateral amputee and would require a 4-wheeler motorised Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) to travel around for his medical appointments and to seek employment.

passiton.name: WheelChair
passiton.description:
Wheelchair is older than 4 years old. is the heavier metal model. bought a replacement lighter model for my mom and thus have this as a spare sitting in the storeroom. 

item is still good condition with the basic function still working. (brakes, seats, footrest etc)
